entry.title: Bitcoin address TTL & key expiration?
entry.summary: Jeff Garzik and Luke Dashjr discussed the validity of ignoring transactions using an address more than once. Although it is valid, few users would appreciate "you ignored my deposit" as a feature. Payment protocol does not fit well for on-going payment streams from Eligius to Coinbase or deposit addresses and situations. However, there's no reason why deposits cannot use a unique payment request or address every time. The link provided explains the serialization format for Bitcoin Improvement Proposals.
